comments.author: Brian Whipple
comments.body: Patch to provide support for ms-sqlserver tablespaces.

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body:
Thanks! Patch committed in revision 792175 and merged to the 1.x branch in revision 792177.

Note that as mentioned in JCR-1295, I would still recommend migration to bundle persistence.

description: Trunk and released version 1.5.0 does not have complete support for ms-sqlserver tablespaces.  This patch was originally submitted via JCR-1295 but was not applied to the 1.4 trunk.
summary: ms-sql tablespace support for FileSystem and PersistenceManager
